nameEntry.part: Order of St. Basil the Great in Canada. Parish of St. Peter and St. Paul, (Mundare, Alta.)

biogHist.p: The Order of St. Basil the Great (OSBM) came to western Canada to minister to Ukrainian Catholic immigrants from the Austro- Hungarian Empire. The first Basilian Mission was founded at Beaver Lake (later Beaver Creek), east of Mundare; the parish church of St. Peter and St. Paul was built ca. 1911 in the town of Mundare. Here the Basilian Fathers have kept baptismal, marriage and death records which date from the Order√æs arrival until the present.
